price: 36. Bapagano bazwi te lifuta liye ekoki na bango na tina ya maye bazalaki kosala.
arabic: هَلۡ ثُوِّبَ ٱلۡكُفَّارُ مَا كَانُواْ يَفۡعَلُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: hal thuwwiba al-kufāru mā kānū yafʿalūna
